== Taliparamba (M) (803258) ==

Taliparamba (M) is a town in the [[Taliparamba]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 43.08 sq. km. and harbouring 15874 households with total population of 72465 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 23 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 545 km. Male population is 33779 and female population is 38686. Scheduled Caste population is 2814 and Scheduled Tribes population is 152. Census Location Code of the town is 803258<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class II (population_total 50,000 to 99,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 50 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 100 km. Railway station is at Kannur at a distance of 22 km.
